title: How to Use Salsa Beyond Dip

steps.headline: Make bruschetta with salsa.
steps.description: A spicier variant on the usual bruschetta, this is great for cold nights as an accompaniment to a hot soup.

steps.headline: Spice up the average macaroni and cheese.
steps.description: Throw in some salsa to spice up the flavor next time you make or cook pre-made macaroni cheese. Add about 10 minutes before the end of cooking time and stir through. New pizazz to an old favorite!

steps.headline: Use salsa for pizza base.
steps.description: And some mashed re-fried beans, some jalapeños, some tomatillos, and you are making one deliciously mean pizza!

steps.headline: Make a salsa salad.
steps.description: Use leftover rice and mix through the salsa, some black beans and corn pieces. Garnish with avocado pieces.

steps.headline: Use as a hotdog sauce.
steps.description: It's piquant and more interesting than the usual ketchup.

steps.headline: Throw some salsa into a soup.
steps.description: This will really warm up the soup and bring out a spicier flavor. Great for tomato based soups but also interestingly tasty for such soups as pumpkin, sweet potato and minestrone soups.

text: Make bruschetta with salsa. A spicier variant on the usual bruschetta, this is great for cold nights as an accompaniment to a hot soup. Spice up the average macaroni and cheese. Throw in some salsa to spice up the flavor next time you make or cook pre-made macaroni cheese. Add about 10 minutes before the end of cooking time and stir through. New pizazz to an old favorite! Use salsa for pizza base. And some mashed re-fried beans, some jalapeños, some tomatillos, and you are making one deliciously mean pizza! Make a salsa salad. Use leftover rice and mix through the salsa, some black beans and corn pieces. Garnish with avocado pieces. Use as a hotdog sauce. It's piquant and more interesting than the usual ketchup. Throw some salsa into a soup. This will really warm up the soup and bring out a spicier flavor. Great for tomato based soups but also interestingly tasty for such soups as pumpkin, sweet potato and minestrone soups.
